title: doc: install-source.html update for 1.5
body:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/go1.5beta3/doc/install-source.html#L170

mentions to "check out the latest release tag":
`$ git checkout go1.4`
the latest release tag would be "go1.5" on the release of 1.5

the same for:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/go1.5beta3/doc/install-source.html#L349
